dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6223 IH: 1099K Elimination Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Perry introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to remove a requirement for payment settlement entities to file returns relating to certain participating payees.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the 1099K Elimination Act of 2023.

section.header: Repeal of requirement for returns relating to payments made in settlement of payment card and third party network transactions

subsection.text: Subpart B of part III of subchapter A of chapter 61 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking section 6050W (and by striking the item relating to such section in the table of sections for such subpart).

paragraph.text: Section 3406(b)(3) of such Code is amended by inserting or at the end of subparagraph (D), by striking the , or at the end of subparagraph (E) and inserting a period, and by striking subparagraph (F).
Section 6724(d) of such Code is amendedâ€”

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1)(B), by striking clause (xxiii), and

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to returns for calendar years beginning after the date of the enactment of this section.
